name: JSONEncoder.NonConformingFloatEncodingStrategy
desc: The strategies for encoding nonconforming floating-point numbers, also known as IEEE 754 exceptional values.

items.name: case convertToString(positiveInfinity: String, negativeInfinity: String, nan: String)
items.desc: The strategy that encodes exceptional floating-point values from a specified string representation.

items.name: case `throw`
items.desc: The strategy that throws an error upon encoding an exceptional floating-point value.
